## CameraRig.packTransform() method

Packs transfrom into the body and head, and 0s out transforms of the eyes. Useful for preparing the rig for control through an animation clip.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
packTransform(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
